author: Belinda Ang Saw Ean J:
casename: Ho Soo Fong and Another v Standard Chartered Bank and Other Applications
counsel: Molly Lim SC and Rokiah Pillay (Wong Tan and Molly Lim LLC) for the plaintiffs; Quek Mong Hua, Michael Kuah, Gan Theng Chong and Mervyn Foo (Lee and Lee) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Banking/Lending and security/Equitable mortgages/Loan facility agreement/Whether equitable mortgage over property in favour of defendant bank created upon acceptance of facility letter by plaintiffs/Intention of parties objectively ascertained
Land/Caveats/Whether defendant bank having caveatable interest in property/Whether caveat lodged with reasonable cause

Land/Caveats/Wrongful lodgment/Compensation payable/Defendant bank failing to remove caveat despite repeated requests to do so/Application by plaintiffs for inquiry as to damages and pecuniary loss recoverable/Whether court should grant application/Section 128 Land Titles Act (Cap 157, 2004 Rev Ed)
